response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to deliver exceptional value and performance. This product is not just an item; it's an investment in quality and efficiency. Given its unique features and benefits, I believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its market value and the cost involved in its development, I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $8,500. This offer is designed to provide you with a substantial savings while ensuring you receive the best possible value for your investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 8500}
